item.title: SMSHTTPS Service – Installation
item.dc:creator: dava-LOC
item.description: Information The SMSHttps Service is the communication core of LOC SMS V4.5.0 and a merger of L_SMS, APIHttps and L_WIN (optional) applications. It is strongly recommended to use SMSInstall to access the Company setup section of Launchpad since the SMSHttps service must be stopped to install/upgrade options and restarted once the operation is completed, SMSInstall […]
